messagebundle.msg: AppBar contains AppBarCommand objects
AppBar containing custom content
Place AppBar at the top edge
Place AppBar at the bottom edge
Place AppBarCommand in the section for global commands
Place AppBarCommand in the section for selection commands
A simple press button
A command that can be selected or unselected
Sets the layout orientation of the FlipView to be horizontal
Sets the layout orientation of the FlipView to be vertical
Place the header of each group above its items
Place the header of each group to the left of its items
ListView represents the beginning of the collection. As the user scrolls, additional items are loaded.
ListView represents the complete collection. As the user jumps around the collection, items are loaded and unloaded.
Disables the selection of items in ListView
Allows up to one item to be selected in ListView
Allows multiple items to be selected in ListView
Swiping an item has no effect
Swiping an item toggles its selection state
Tapping an item has no effect
Tapping an item invokes it
Tapping an item invokes it and toggles its selection state
Tapping an item invokes it and causes it to be the only item that is selected
Horizontal
Vertical
